name: Christmas Santa Go
description:
Santa Run is game for christmas festival. Santa Run is a challenging game for christmas holiday. Santa Run in this fun – filled action – packed platform game!

This free Christmas Game features 10 challenging levels, each tougher than the previous one! The rich colorful graphics and background music will keep you engaged!

FEATURES OF SANTA RUN GAME ARE:
★ 10 challenging levels
★ Awesome music and graphics
★ Higher levels make it difficult to catch coins!
★ Play this free Christmas Game with your friends and see who takes the least time to finish each level

Kiyan Softech Team Wishing Merry Christmas To All!
